definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

pinyin: qiang3 po4 xing4 xing4 xing2 wei2

sentences.english: Offenses with this characteristic usually will be encountered as assimilative crimes.
sentences.chinese: 带有此特征的犯罪行为通常将视为同等犯罪。

sentences.english: She felt a bit comfortlessness to his licentious behavior.
sentences.chinese: 她对他放肆的行为感到有点不舒服。

sentences.english: They are adhering to what society expects and internalising behaviours。
sentences.chinese: 他们遵从社会期望，并在行为上把这些期望内在化。

sentences.english: Part four elaborates the author's opinion about the basis of the criminal responsibility of the actio libera in cause.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分，原因自由行为之可罚性基础的再思考。

sentences.english: "The actions of one soldier were nothing more than criminal behavior," Hammond said.
sentences.chinese: “这名士兵的行为是实实在在的犯罪，”哈蒙德说。

sentences.english: The failure to appreciate the iPhone was all mine.
sentences.chinese: 这个放弃欣赏iphone的行为全是我自己的想法。

sentences.english: Fourth, the failure is beyond the unit's will.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪行为未达既遂是由于单位意志以外的原因。

sentences.english: Speech acts are the important field in pragmatics.
sentences.chinese: 言语行为是语用学研究的一个重要领域。

sentences.english: There should be absolutely no behavioral tracking of minors.
sentences.chinese: 对于未成年人应该是完全没有的行为跟踪的。

sentences.english: Gifted children can appear to have the same behaviours as those with Asperger's.
sentences.chinese: 天才儿童会出现一些与亚斯普杰氏症候群相同的行为。

sentences.english: And "sexsomnia" disorders are easily treated with medication, he added.
sentences.chinese: 申克还指出，性行为睡眠障碍用药物治疗很方便。

sentences.english: The rampant and absurd behavior that prince 2 for people unprepared.
sentences.chinese: 这猖獗而荒唐的行为叫马王二人一时措手不及。

sentences.english: The third part of the study focused on the status of vocational school students bad habits.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分集中考察职校生不良行为习惯的现状。

sentences.english: How Do You Report Suspected Tax Fraud Activity?
sentences.chinese: 如何举报可疑的税物造假行为？

sentences.english: This explains practical significance of imitative writing in the history of Yue-fu poetry development.
sentences.chinese: 这一创作行为在乐府诗的发展史上具有重要的意义。

sentences.english: Bonobos have developed a set of ritualized socio-sexual behaviors that are specific to their species.
sentences.chinese: 倭黑猩猩已经形成了一套自己独特的社交性行为。

definition: words and actions/what one says and what one does
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
